content: a cozy and simple hat that knits up in one night using thick woolen yarn and silk-mohair materials 100 g of sandnes garn fritidsgarn 25 g of sandnes garn tynn silk mohair needles 6 mm gauge 14 sts x 20 rounds = 10 cm x 10 cm/4 x 4 in false english ribbing in the round on 6 mm needles one size circumference approx 48 5 cm
